post_title: FS: 'T206' Tobacco card Wooden Boxes *In Stock*
post_content:
EDIT - Father-in-law is retired - NO MORE BOXES.....


Fresh batch of 'T206' Tobacco card wooden boxes are back!  Currently, only 2 are in stock and ready to ship.  My father-in-law has sold over 2 dozen of these in the past couple years (mostly to Net54 members).  I PM'd just about everyone that has been requesting one for months.  A few have been sold already.
Net54 discount is set at $125 + $45 S/H = $170 via PayPal, MO, check.  International will be more.

PM me to get the discount. 

These are beautiful, cigar style boxes.  Please visit [URL="http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com"]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/URL] for more pictures and information.
Holds about 525 'Ultra-Pro' tobacco top loaders.  Dividers can be removed to hold about 40 graded cards - see pictures.  Available with or without top logo.

Other boxes available:

Raw/Ungraded card box:
[URL="http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=1094497#post1094497"]LINK TO POST[/URL]

Graded card box: 
[URL="http://net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=1050932#post1050932"]LINK TO POST[/URL]



[url]https://net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=439746&stc=1&d=1612880946[/url]


If the pictures don't load - please see the website.

[IMG]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com/uploads/6/1/2/8/6128218/6175214.jpg[/IMG]

Bump.
A couple are sold.  A few remain of the 'Graded' boxes also.  PM for details and the Net54 discount.
Price lowered on remaining boxes.  Please PM to get the discounted price.

Just got mine today. It was my Christmas present to myself. I am VERY pleased. It has already reignited my interest in my set. Really is no reason to have thousands of dollars in a set and not have something nice to enjoy them in. Thanks!

Jeff
A couple remain.  PM to reserve one today!

2/21/14: New Inventory just added. A few are ready to ship. Inventory includes 'Graded' boxes, 'Raw card' boxes and 'T206 - tobacco' boxes. Please refer to the first post for the latest info and PM if interested.
5/1:  All the different boxes are in stock and ready to ship.  Please PM first for the Net54 deals.
9/14 - a couple of these boxes remain.

Jon, those are absolutely beautiful. I've seen them a few times now, and I'm always impressed. 

I have to sit down, and start figuring out how I'm going to start storing all my different sets, and what's going to the safe deposit box. At some point in the future, I might get one of your boxes for my T206 cards at home. The Box Factory boxes I have can be used for my PSA slabs. 

This box looks like it just fits the set so well. A really beautiful heirloom storage case for the best set ever made. I think $175 a box is a steal.
Thanks Bill.  I love this box best.  My T206 set (minus a few graded cards) resides in one.  Sold one this week.  A few more remain.

Only 1 or 2 remain until spring 2015.  With or without tobacco decal.

PM if interested.

2/7 update:  A fresh batch of 3 boxes are ready to ship.
PM if interested in the Net54 discount.

Other box styles available too.  See [URL="http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com"]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/URL] for pictures.

7/21 Update:  (from my father-in-law) More boxes in stock and ready to ship.  Custom box orders are also being accepted.  Please refer to the first post in this thread for pricing and details.  PM for more info.
10/21/15 - boxes are back in stock and ready to ship.  PM if interested in the Net54 discount.
12/27/2015 - HOLIDAY SALE on the 'Tobacco/T206' boxes.  Please PM first for the Net54 discount.
4/9/2016 - Another batch of boxes are finished.  Please see the first post and PM me for Net54 price/payment instructions.
8/29/16 - boxes are back in stock!  Please see the first post for pricing and discount information.
Fresh batch available on 11/27/16.  Please refer to the first post for details.  PM if interested.

4/2017:  New lock design for 2017.  See new pictures below.  Refer to the first post for Net54 discount information and additional details.  PM for more info.

[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/2017t206box.jpg[/IMG]
1/5/18:  bump for new inventory of all 3 box types.  See first post for details.
bump for new inventory.

Bump for new inventory.  Net54 discounts still apply.  Please see the first post for more details.  Holidays are coming - order early.  Special requests too!
[url]www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/url]

New boxes are ready to be shipped.  Please see the first post for details.


Edit - apparently that website is down.  You can view his boxes on eBay:

[URL="https://www.ebay.com/sch/dakotawoodcraft/m.html"]https://www.ebay.com/sch/dakotawoodcraft/m.html[/URL]

Please refer to the first post for Net54 pricing etc.

Sale going on.  Contact Loren directly via his website:  [URL="http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com"]HERE[/URL]

Knock roughly $5 off the sale price on each box shown when you mention Net54.

Jon I sent Loren a message through his site. 

Thanks. 

Scott

Fresh batch of boxes available!  All types.  Custom orders are possible too.

Please contact Loren directly for the best most current pricing.

2020 Holidays are here!  Boxes are in stock and ready to ship.

Contact Loren directly also: [url]dakotawoodcrafts@gmail.com[/url] and mention Net54

12/12/20 Update:  Only one 'T206' box remains.  The next batch may not be ready until February.

Current price is $170 for Net54 members.
A few more completed this weekend and ready to ship!

In stock and ready to ship.
Custom box orders - please inquire.
Mention Net54 for the discounted price!
A few in stock for the holidays.  PM if interested.

Bump for 2023!  Last of the current inventory is available.  A couple T206 boxes (with or without logo on top) remain and are reduced to $150/delivered until they are all gone.  Production won't return until 2024!  Please see the first post for contact information.
